研究报告称，贫困和炎症对死亡率的综合影响比单独影响的预期更严重研究人员调查了慢性炎症和贫困的结合是否会协同增加 40 岁及以上美国成年人 15 年内全因死亡、心脏病和癌症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Combined-effect-of-poverty-and-inflammation-on-mortality-is-worse-than-expected-from-separate-effects-study-reports。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Combined-effect-of-poverty-and-inflammation-on-mortality-is-worse-than-expected-from-separate-effects-study-reports。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1193377-c08c-4494-b14a-cb321ca03fba Thu, 18 Jan 2024 09:26:00 -0500 Combined effect of poverty and inflammation on mortality is worse than expected from separate effects, study reports
